title: OK
description: The request was successful and the server returned the requested resource. This is the most common success status, indicating that the server processed the request and returned the expected result.

title: Not Found
description: The requested resource could not be found on the server. This typically happens when the resource is missing or the URL is incorrect.

title: Internal Server Error
description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. This is usually a general error message for server-side issues.
